text: Ki tusim nahim dekhade ki alaha ne jihara kujha akasam ate dharati vica hai, tuhadi seva vica laga dita hai. Ate usa ne apani'am pratakha ate gujhi'am ni'amatam tuhade upara puri'am kara diti'am hana. Lokam vica ajihe vi hana jihare bina kise gi'ana, nasihata ate prakasama'i kitaba tom alaha de bare jhagara karade hana
